season_standing.tie_break_rule:
In the event that two (or more) teams finish with an equal number of points, the following rules break the tie:
1. Head-to-head games between the teams concerned 1a. Points total 1b. Goal difference 1c. Goals scored 2. Goal difference 3. Goals scored

In the event that two (or more) teams finish with an equal number of points, the following rules break the tie:
1. Head-to-head games between the teams concerned 1a. Points total 1b. Goal difference 1c. Goals scored 2. Goal difference 3. Goals scored
